application.control

Class ShowData

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.control.ShowData

  • public class ShowData
extends java.lang.Object
    ShowData class is used to display data in a StackedBarChart format. It is a singleton class, with a static final instance field, and a getInstance() method to access it. The class has methods to initialize, set and update data, set StackedBarChart and threshold values, and update threshold values.
